question: The simple interest on 7300 Rs. from 11 May, 1987 to 10 september, 1987 (both days included) at 5% per annum is :
explanation:
Time from 11 May to 10 September, 1987
= 21 + 30 + 31 + 31 + 10 = 123 days
$latex \\therefore Time = 123\\ days = \\frac{123}{365}\\ year&s=1$
$latex \\therefore SI = \\frac{7300\\times 123\\times 5}{365\\times 100} = 123\\ Rs.&s=1$
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
